text: Juan Cruz Argüello (born 19 April 2000) is an Argentinian professional footballer who plays as a right-back for Instituto. ==Career== Argüello's youth career started with El Trébol de El Tío, playing for the club for four years from 2006. In 2010, Argüello joined the Instituto youth system. He made his first-team breakthrough in 2019 and was selected for his professional bow during a home defeat in Primera B Nacional to Central Córdoba, coming off the substitutes bench in place of Alan Aguirre on 29 March. ==Career statistics== . {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="1"|Instituto |2018–19 |rowspan="1"|Primera B Nacional |1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||1||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !1!!0!!0!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!0!!0!!1!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Córdoba Province, Argentina Category:Argentine footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Primera B Nacional players Category:Instituto footballers
